channel.title: sql on Mátyás Budavári
channel.description: Recent content in sql on Mátyás Budavári

item.title: MSSQL Server Adventures
item.description: As I wrote in my last post, I’ve been working closely with Microsoft SQL server for a while now. Since then I’ve found some more tricks that made my life easier.

item.title: MSSQL Server Basics
item.description: In the past couple of weeks I’ve started to work with Microsoft SQL Server. I have a pretty good founation of SQL from high school, but I’ve only used PostgreSQL so far in my carreer. I collect the snippets I found to be the most useful ones that helped me getting started.

item.title: Postgres External Python Call
item.description: After experiencing the awesomeness of External Calls in Snowflake I decided to look into the possibilities of running external snippets from Postgres.

item.title: External Function Calls From Snowflake
item.description: A few months ago at work, I wrote a simple node.js snippet to calculate route distances in Mapbox. Now I’m proud, that it’s used to demonstrate how to use Mapbox calculations from Snowflake.
